content.json:
# Azure API Management Insights

This workbook provides comprehensive monitoring and insights for Azure API Management resources, including request metrics, performance data, and error analysis.

parameters.name: LogAnalyticsWorkspace
parameters.query:
Resources
| where type == 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces'
| where subscriptionId == '{Subscription:subscriptionId}'
| project value = id, label = name, selected = false
| sort by label asc
parameters.label: Log Analytics Workspace

parameters.name: ApiManagementService
parameters.query:
// Find APIM resources from both resource-specific and legacy diagnostic logs
let ResourceSpecificLogs = 
    ApiManagementGatewayLogs
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(30d)
    | project _ResourceId
    | distinct _ResourceId;
let LegacyLogs = 
    AzureDiagnostics
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(30d)
    | where Category == "GatewayLogs" or ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.APIMANAGEMENT"
    | project ResourceId
    | distinct ResourceId
    | extend _ResourceId = ResourceId;
union ResourceSpecificLogs, LegacyLogs
| distinct _ResourceId
| project value = _ResourceId, label = _ResourceId, selected = false
| sort by label asc
parameters.label: API Management Service (Optional - leave blank for all)

content.title: API Requests Over Time

content.query:
// Union both resource-specific and legacy diagnostic logs
let ResourceSpecificLogs = 
    ApiManagementGatewayLogs
    | where "{ApiManagementService}" == "value::all" or _ResourceId == "{ApiManagementService}"
    | project TimeGenerated, ResponseCode, ResponseTime, BackendResponseTime, ApiId, _ResourceId;
let LegacyLogs = 
    AzureDiagnostics
    | where Category == "GatewayLogs"
    | where "{ApiManagementService}" == "value::all" or ResourceId == "{ApiManagementService}"
    | project TimeGenerated, ResponseCode = toint(responseCode_d), ResponseTime = responseTime_d, BackendResponseTime = backendResponseTime_d, ApiId = apiId_s, _ResourceId = ResourceId;
union ResourceSpecificLogs, LegacyLogs
| summarize 
    TotalRequests = count(),
    SuccessfulRequests = countif(ResponseCode < 400),
    ClientErrors = countif(ResponseCode >= 400 and ResponseCode < 500),
    ServerErrors = countif(ResponseCode >= 500)
| extend 
    SuccessRate = round((SuccessfulRequests * 100.0) / TotalRequests, 2),
    ErrorRate = round(((ClientErrors + ServerErrors) * 100.0) / TotalRequests, 2)
content.title: Request Summary

content.query:
// Union both resource-specific and legacy diagnostic logs
let ResourceSpecificLogs = 
    ApiManagementGatewayLogs
    | where "{ApiManagementService}" == "value::all" or _ResourceId == "{ApiManagementService}"
    | where isnotnull(ResponseTime)
    | project TimeGenerated, ResponseTime, BackendResponseTime, ApiId, _ResourceId;
let LegacyLogs = 
    AzureDiagnostics
    | where Category == "GatewayLogs"
    | where "{ApiManagementService}" == "value::all" or ResourceId == "{ApiManagementService}"
    | where isnotnull(responseTime_d)
    | project TimeGenerated, ResponseTime = responseTime_d, BackendResponseTime = backendResponseTime_d, ApiId = apiId_s, _ResourceId = ResourceId;
union ResourceSpecificLogs, LegacyLogs
| summarize 
    AvgResponseTime = avg(ResponseTime),
    P50ResponseTime = percentile(ResponseTime, 50),
    P95ResponseTime = percentile(ResponseTime, 95),
    P99ResponseTime = percentile(ResponseTime, 99)
    by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
| sort by TimeGenerated asc
content.title: Response Time Percentiles

content.query:
// Union both resource-specific and legacy diagnostic logs
let ResourceSpecificLogs = 
    ApiManagementGatewayLogs
    | where "{ApiManagementService}" == "value::all" or _ResourceId == "{ApiManagementService}"
    | where isnotnull(BackendResponseTime)
    | project TimeGenerated, BackendResponseTime, _ResourceId;
let LegacyLogs = 
    AzureDiagnostics
    | where Category == "GatewayLogs"
    | where "{ApiManagementService}" == "value::all" or ResourceId == "{ApiManagementService}"
    | where isnotnull(backendResponseTime_d)
    | project TimeGenerated, BackendResponseTime = backendResponseTime_d, _ResourceId = ResourceId;
union ResourceSpecificLogs, LegacyLogs
| summarize 
    AvgBackendTime = avg(BackendResponseTime),
    P95BackendTime = percentile(BackendResponseTime, 95)
    by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
| sort by TimeGenerated asc

content.query:
AzureMetrics
| where MetricName == "Capacity"
| where "{ApiManagementService}" == "value::all" or _ResourceId == "{ApiManagementService}"
| summarize AvgCapacity = avg(Average) by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
| sort by TimeGenerated asc
